conbody.p: This menu allows you to perform actions to all students in the class, irrespective to a group they belong to.
Select the Whole class tab to open the class menu ( ).

Class menu includes following items:
Group (see )
Clear all calls (see )
Self listening OFF
Message to all
Voting
Autoscan
Press Self listening OFF button to turn off self listening mode (see ) for all students. Press this button again to turn self listening back on.
Press Message to all button to deliver a spoken message to the students (see ). Press this button again to exit the message to all mode.
Press the Poll _fixme_ [ui] button to start polling the students (see ). Press this button again to finish the poll.

Press Autoscan button to start covertly listening to students in the class one by one. Interval for autoscan listening can be specified in the settings menu (see ). Press this button again to exit the autoscan mode.
